Tried and True

Medium 18.00 / Large 21.00

Sorry, no substitutions or modifications to the specially priced “Tried and True” pies. But we’ll happily build your custom pie at the per topping price. Ask your concierge about wine and beer pairings!

Margherita (fresh mozzarella, diced Roma tomatoes, garlic & basil)

White pie with spinach (olive oil, garlic, ricotta & mozzarella)

Eggplant pie (a NY staple that’s like eggplant parmesan on a pie)

Spinach, roasted red pepper, green olives, onions

Pepperoni & mushroom (THE classic of all classics)

Sausage, ricotta cheese and roasted red pepper

White clam pizza 21.00 / 25.00 (chopped clams, olive oil, garlic, fresh oregano and Pecorino Romano—street cred in Naples and New Haven)

Each Home Slice pie is made to order with fresh ingredients and cooked directly on 2 inch bricks in an old school deck oven.

Wine and Beer

Wine

In Italy, wine isn’t fancy. It’s viewed as an essential ingredient to the meal, like cheese on pizza. We serve Italian wines because they’re bona fide—handcrafted with passion and care for each step of the process, just like Home Slice pizza. Each of our Italian wines are delicious in their own right, ask us to steer you in the right direction.
